channel.title: Posts on udaypandey
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on udaypandey

item.title: Gosaikunda trek
item.description: gosaikunda I went to Gosaikunda. Link to heading We had been planning to go there for about a month, and we finally did it. We started our journey on 14th April (Baisakh 1). The group consisted of Samir, Amrit, I. We took a bus from Buspark to Dhunche, Rasuwa. It took about 6 hours. We started our trek from Dhunche at 1 pm. On the first day, we walked 5 hours.

item.title: First Autopsy
item.description: autopsy I performed my first autopsy. Link to heading This was in our forensic medicine practicals. We had a senior doctor guiding us, and also a helper. I immediately volunteered to perform the autopsy. Two other guys also volunteered. It was a unique experience. I wasn’t nervous at all. I honestly felt nothing, other than slight anticipation. Also the body wasn’t that bad, it was pretty well preserved. I performed an incision of the torso, I cut open the stomach, and also examined the heart, which was taken out of the body.

item.title: I made a website
item.description: So, I made a website using Hugo. And it was very easy. Link to heading It’s pretty easy to build a website. It took me about one week of searching, reading and copy-pasting to build this website. I didn’t want to make a wordpress website, that would have been way easier. I chose to use Static Site Generators (SSGs)1. Making a website with SSGs is also pretty easy, but for someone like me, with no coding experience, this was quite a challenge.

item.title: More Testing
item.description: I’m doing more testing. Shortcodes Avisos Link to heading Note I’m smiling. 😄 Tip Study more. 📖 Example Handegg is a sport. 🏈 Question What is love? Baby don’t hurt me.. Info Cyanide is poisonous. 💀 Warning I’m handsome! 😏 Error You’re stupid. This is how you add charts to websites. flowchart LR Study --> Pass Pass --> Happy Happy --> Money Money --> Happy

item.title: Just testing
item.description: I’m just testing my website. Image test Link to heading Sunsetsuccess Youtube test (I love this song 😇) Link to heading Twitter test Link to heading Owl bet you'll lose this staring contest 🦉 pic.twitter.com/eJh4f2zncC — San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance (@sandiegozoo) October 26, 2021 Blockquote with attribution Link to heading It is a shame for a man to grow old without seeing the beauty and strength of which his body is capable.
